bibl.title: Loyalty and Dissidence in Roman Egypt. The Case of the Acta Alexandrinorum.
bibl.note: 1. Introduction. - 2. The embassies to Gaius and Claudius. - 3. The Acta Alexandrinorum: Augustus to the Severans. - 4. The Acta Alexandrinorum: The historical background. - 5. Between loyalty and dissent: The Acta Alexandrinorum and contemporary literature. - 6. Conclusion. - Appendices. Bibliography. Index.
bibl.seg: HARKER Andrew, Loyalty and Dissidence in Roman Egypt. The Case of the Acta Alexandrinorum.
Cambridge, Cambridge University Press, 2008, 8°, vi-256 pp. ISBN 978-0-521-88789-2. £55.
